title: Download the output of an async report task

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. Please use the same access token as the Create an asynchronous report task operation.

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID. Note : If you use advertiser_ids when calling /report/task/create/ (POST method), you need to set this field to one of the Advertiser IDs specified via advertiser_ids .

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the asynchronous report task.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: download_url
fields.description: The URL to download the file, valid for 1 hour. You can use the /report/task/download/ endpoint to query a new URL if the previous URL has expired.

fields.name: file_name
fields.description: The name of the downloaded file.

fields.name: output_format
fields.description: Format of output. Enum values: CSV_DOWNLOAD , XLSX_DOWNLOAD .

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log ID of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.

example.body:
